title: Clean up the Development Tasks card interface by removing unnecessary git workflow fields (Branch, PR Status, Rebase) to create a more focused and user-friendly task management experience within the User Interface component
description: As a project manager using the AIPM workspace, I want the Development Tasks card interface to focus only on essential task management fields so that I can manage tasks more efficiently without being distracted by git-specific workflow information that belongs in the development environment rather than the project management interface.

acceptanceTests.description: Remove Branch, PR Status, and Rebase fields from Development Tasks card
criteria: Branch field is no longer visible in task cards
PR Status field is no longer visible in task cards
Rebase field is no longer visible in task cards
Task card layout adjusts properly without these fields
No broken UI elements or spacing issues after field removal

acceptanceTests.description: Ensure essential task management fields remain functional
criteria: All existing task management functionality works as before

acceptanceTests.description: Validate improved focus and usability of task interface
criteria: Task cards display only project management relevant information
Interface feels less cluttered and more focused
Task creation and editing workflows are streamlined
No regression in task management capabilities

tasks.description: Identify and document all git workflow fields in Development Tasks card component
Remove Branch, PR Status, and Rebase field rendering from task card template
Adjust CSS layout and spacing after field removal
Test all remaining task management functionality works correctly

investAnalysis.feedback: Story meets INVEST criteria - removes specific UI fields to improve user experience, is appropriately sized, and has clear acceptance criteria.
